data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chamorro-Rengifo, Juliana, Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano (2009): The first report of Rumea Desutter, 1988 (Orthoptera: Phalangopsidae: Paragryllini) from Brazil, with the description of three new Amazonian species. Zootaxa 2265: 48-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190831
